login.alreadyhave: Already have a Pocket (or Read It Later) account?
login.alreadyusedemail: The email you entered is already in use by another account. Please login if you'd like to use that account instead.
login.cantbecompleted: Login cannot be completed without an internet connection.
login.donthaveaccount: Don't have a Pocket account? Create one in seconds.
login.forgotname: I forgot my username or password.
login.hello: Hello. Great to see you again!
login.incorrectusername: The username and or password you entered was incorrect.
login.pleaseenternewpassword: Please enter a new password at least 6 characters long.
login.servererror: Unknown server error. Please restart the app and try again.
login.supereasy: It's super easy and doesn't cost you a thing.
login.whenyoufind: When you find something you want to view later, put it in Pocket.

error.enteremailusername: Please enter an email address or a username.
error.emailinvalidalt: Please enter a valid email address
error.troubleprocessinglogin: We had trouble logging you in. Please try again or *contact Pocket Support* to let us know.
error.troubleprocessingsignup: We had trouble signing you up for Pocket. Please try again or *contact Pocket Support* to let us know.

gsf.accesspocketondevices: Access Pocket on your computer, iOS or Android devices, even without an internet connection.
gsf.activatefullscreenmodeagain: Press 'd' again to activate Full Screen Mode at any time.
gsf.addtopockethere: You can add to Pocket here. Find a cool article or YouTube video to test it out.
gsf.buttonsitsintoolbar: The button sits in your toolbar so you can save any page with just one click.
gsf.clicktosaveapage: Click to save a page you want to view later.
gsf.connectingpocketbuttonprovides: Connecting the Pocket button provides the best way to save pages to Pocket.
gsf.connectmobile: Connect your mobile devices - it even works offline!
gsf.greatplacesavevideos: Pocket is also a great place to save videos.
gsf.installingthepocketbuttonclick: Installing the Pocket button adds a button to your browser that lets you save items with one click.
gsf.learnmoreways: *Learn more ways* to add content to Pocket.
gsf.leavefullscreenmode: Press 'd' on your keyboard to leave Full Screen Mode, or simply move your mouse to the top of your browser window.
gsf.openpagenotarticle: If you open a page that is not an article or video, or you select the Web View toggle in the top toolbar, Pocket will display the original web page.
gsf.perfectarticles: Did you know that Pocket is perfect for reading articles? Go ahead and save an article to read later.
gsf.pocketdisplaysoptimized: Pocket displays this optimized view for articles
gsf.readingpositionsaved: If you’d like to return to this page later, your reading position will be automatically synced across devices.
gsf.returntogetpocket: Then return to GetPocket.com to view your list.
gsf.savedfewnice: You've saved a few items. Nicely done!
gsf.savedfirstitemclick: You saved your first item to Pocket. Click it to check it out.
gsf.savedfirstitemclickalt: Saved items are shown here. Click an item to check it out.
gsf.savefromyoutube: Save something from YouTube and give it a try.
gsf.savethingsviewlater: Save things you want to view later to Pocket.
gsf.thismodehidestoolbar: This mode hides the top toolbar to help you focus entirely on article content.
gsf.thispasswordwill: This password will let you connect Pocket to services like Twitter or Flipboard.
gsf.toseeoriginal: To see the original, click the share button and select 'View in Browser.'
gsf.toviewarchived: To view your archived items, tap Pocket above and then select "Archive"
gsf.ventureoutandsave: Venture out and save your first item using the Pocket Button. Try out a news article or YouTube video.
gsf.youarchivefavshare: You can Archive, Favorite, or Share on this page.
gsf.yourereadytosave: You're ready to save anything to Pocket.
gsf.youvesignedupforpocket: You've successfully signed up for Pocket - the simple way to save things you want to view later.

help.archiveitemorsave: Archive Item or Save Item to List
help.switchhomefavarchive: Switch to My List, Favorites and Archive

queue.couldntresend: Couldn't resend the confirmation email. Please try again.
queue.foreasiersavingexpanded: For even easier saving, *connect* the Pocket Button
queue.hassharedconfirm: has shared something with you in Pocket. To view it, please confirm your email:
queue.mostpowerful: Upgrade to get powerful new features
queue.premiumnew_msg1: We’ve just started upgrading your account to Premium. This may take some time, depending on the number of things you’ve saved to Pocket.
queue.search_trysearching: Search for topics, tags, titles, URLs, authors or text within articles.
queue.webviewwarn_webonlydetail: If you open a page that is not an article or video, Pocket will display the original web page.
queue.webviewwarn_webonlyview: This saved item is a web only view, and will open in a new tab.

notice.designlightermoreintuitive: The design is lighter, cleaner and more intuitive
notice.enjoypocketforweb: We hope you enjoy the new Pocket for Web!
notice.newpocketcombinesfeatures: The new Pocket for web combines the best features from our mobile apps with high quality web design
notice.readmoreonblog: You can read more on our *blog* and click the button below to get started
notice.savemanuallyurl: You can now save by manually entering a URL. Just press the "+" button in the toolbar
notice.selectbulkitems: Select items while holding Command/Control or Shift to perform actions in bulk
notice.tunedreadingexperience: We analyzed and tuned every aspect of the reading experience to make it even more enjoyable and easier to use
notice.useshortcutstomove: Use shortcuts to move through your list, perform actions, and more. Just press "?" to view the shortcut guide

notification.couldnotloadlist: Could Not Load List. There was a problem fetching your list from the server. Please make sure you are connected to the Internet.
notification.fontbundlechange: The font bundle has been changed. Please *reload this page* for the change to take effect.
notification.fontbundleexpanded: The font bundle has been expanded for this article. Please *reload this page* for the change to take effect.
notification.invalidaddurl: The URL is invalid and cannot be saved. Please use a valid URL beginning with http:// or https://
notification.itemnotfound: This item cannot be found in your list. You will be redirected automatically.
notification.langchange: The language has been changed. Please *reload this page* for the change to take effect.
notification.tagsarelimited: Tags are limited to 25 characters, please shorten the tag
notification.unexpectederror: Uh oh. There was an unexpected error when making a request to the server. Please try reloading the page.
notification.urlindataobject: Provide at least an url in the data object

reader.notarticlenotdisplaywell: This page doesn't appear to be an article and therefore may not display well in the Article View
reader.maywanttoswitch: You may want to switch to the *full web page view*
reader.ifshouldbearticle: If you know there should be an article here, help improve the article parser by *reporting this page*

search.archiveemptymsg: Pocket remembers the content that you have already read, watched and viewed.* When you archive an item, it'll appear here.
search.favoritesemptymsg: Keep track of the content you've liked: To favorite an item, click the star next to it.
search.learnhowexpanded: *Learn how* to add content to Pocket.
search.matchedyoursearchfor: No xxxxx in your yyyyy matched your search for 'aaaaa'.
search.matchedyoursearchforwtags: No xxxxx in your yyyyy that zzzzz matched your search for 'aaaaa'.
search.nobeentagged: No xxxxx in your yyyyy zzzzz.
search.nomatchesforsearch: There were no items that matched your search.
search.nopremiumyet: Pocket is preparing Full-Text Search for your account and it will be available soon. Standard search results are currently being shown.
search.pleaseenteratleastexpanded: Please enter at least * characters to search.

sharing.addemailaddressclick: Please click below to add your email address so recipients can identify you.

tag.fromanyitemsthathavebeentagged: from any items that have been tagged with it.
tag.suggestedtagserror: We’re having trouble retrieving suggested tags. Reload the page and try again.
tag.suggestedtagsnone: We were unable to find any suggested tags for this item.
tag.tagexistswouldyoulikemerge: A tag named *xxxxx* already exists, would you like to merge *yyyyy* into *zzzzz*?
tag.thiswillremove: Are you sure you want to delete the tag {name_of_tag} and remove it from all items?
